title: Black Monday Recap, Who Will Fill Head Coaching Vacancies (Football 01/2)
description:
Nick Kostos, Will Brinson and Pete Prisco break down Black Monday in the NFL. First, they discuss an opening that's been open for a while now, and the prestige of the job as head coach of the New York Giants. Then, Nick, Will and Pete discuss Jon Gruden potentially re-joining the Oakland Raiders, and his merits as a coach. That's followed by talk on the Cardinals, Bears, Colts and Lions vacancies.
